resources.string: This application operate only on camera, so please give us your camera permission
This app operate on writing to your external storage, please give us writing to your external storage

We can\'t complete our functionality because we don\'t have write to external permission
We can\'t complete our functionality because we don\'t have your location permission
This app operate on access your location to get weather data, please give us location permission
